short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a desktop notification when a message is received in tfs team room

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows notification when a team room chat message is posted in a team room that you opened.

v1.39 removed hardcoded DefaultCollection from code
